scripts.setup: npm run db:push && npm run seed
scripts.install-schedule: mkdir -p logs && cp com.mai.sheets-sync.plist ~/Library/LaunchAgents/ && launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.mai.sheets-sync.plist && echo 'Daily 7am sync installed.'
scripts.install-youtube-tracker: mkdir -p logs && cp com.mai.youtube-tracker.plist ~/Library/LaunchAgents/ && launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.mai.youtube-tracker.plist && echo 'Daily 8am YouTube view tracker installed.'
scripts.uninstall-youtube-tracker: launchctl unload ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.mai.youtube-tracker.plist 2>/dev/null; rm -f ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.mai.youtube-tracker.plist && echo 'YouTube tracker removed.'
